name: Spliterator (Trijam #197)
description:
Controls:

  • Movement: wasd or arrows
  • Fire: space (hold)

Made in 4 hours for Trijam #197. I completed the main game in 3 hours, but gave myself an extra hour to add visual and audio fx to make the game much more fun.

When hit, your screen splits. If split more than twice, that ship is destroyed. Destroy incoming attacks for points. The difficulty level increases every 5 enemies destroyed and resets when split. Destroying an enemy gives 5 points per level (ex. an enemy on level 3 gives 15 points). The maximum difficulty level is 10.
